query:
SELECT m.id, m.title, m.conditionId, COUNT(p.id) as pred_count
FROM predictions p
INNER JOIN markets m ON p.marketId = m.id
GROUP BY m.id, m.title, m.conditionId
ORDER BY pred_count DESC
LIMIT 3;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EZig2ebo1q21z8.root --database 4sa6kfx5mFXsBhiWnpTsNp --execute SELECT m.id, m.title, m.conditionId, COUNT(p.id) as pred_count
FROM predictions p
INNER JOIN markets m ON p.marketId = m.id
GROUP BY m.id, m.title, m.conditionId
ORDER BY pred_count DESC
LIMIT 3;
